data.name: Watchman
data.detailed_description:
STORY:

You are the night watchman of an old and abandoned gym, this job is your everything. The place where you can escape from all your problems and worries.
The watchman's office has become your fortress - the only untouched place.
I need to find out who I really am.
I saw a familiar silhouette peeking out of the pink room.
Yes, it's me, of course... Do you see me again?

FEATURES:

  • Unique experience from gameplay and atmosphere.
  • Full and authentic immersion in a nightmare filled with important details and images.
  • The unusual storytelling.
  • Variety of gameplay.

GAMEPLAY:

  • Your main responsibilities include: sitting in your office and watching what happens inside the freestyle wrestling gym. It is important to be aware of the fact that you are not alone in this gym, or that you are not in it at all ...
  • For your personal safety, you will have 2 armored doors that must be used very competently, since the doors have very problematic electronic mechanisms.
  • In addition to the night watchman's shifts, where you were only required to sit and look at the cameras, you also need to explore this place, which is already broadcasting its truth.

data.short_description: Immerse yourself in the depths of the subconscious through nightmares filled with a huge number of details and images. And form your idea about the personality of the main character and his inner world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10, 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-530
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM, NVIDIA Geforce GTX 260 / ATI Radeon HD 4870
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains: nudity, sexual content, profanity, bloody bodies and screamers.
